org.apache.jmeter.util
Class SlowSocket

java.lang.Object
  java.net.Socket
      org.apache.jmeter.util.SlowSocket
public class SlowSocket
extends Socket

"Slow" (non-SSL) socket implementation to emulate dial-up modems etc
